value:
My homeland is always blanketed by
snow. Compared to that, it's warm
here. Hot, even. I'm sweating!$k$pCan you direct me to where I might
bathe?

Nifl, the Kingdom of Ice, is bitterly cold
during the winter. As children, my
sisters and I cuddled as we slept.

If you feel tired, I'd suggest taking a
nap. I always used to tell my sisters
the same thing!

You have my apologies. It's so warm
and comfortable here... I just dozed
off.

On behalf of my dear sisters, I will do
whatever I can to help you. Please
don't hesitate to ask for anything.

Today, I come bearing the greetings
of $Nf.
Oh, how delightful.

Thank goodness! I can breathe a
little sigh of relief.
Oh, my... What should I do now?
How kind you are to think of me.

I am Gunnthrá of Nifl. Oh, my! We
are finally acquainted. In dreams,
I've sensed your desire to meet.

Oh, $Nu...
Sweet $Nu...$k$pYes, it is I, Gunnthrá. We first met in a
dream. At last we're united.$k$pAs you may remember...I can't speak
to just anyone using that rite.$k$pOnce I establish that link...I can speak
to just one person, for my entire life...$k$pAnd to make that connection, I have
to pledge myself to them from the very
depths of my heart.$k$pI can tell that you understand what I
mean, $Nu.$k$pWhen we first spoke, I knew almost
nothing of you...$k$pYet I pledged myself to you without
hesitation.$k$pOh, don't fret. I would never hold that
over you, even as a joke!$k$pIf there is anything I can ever do to
help you, just say the word. It would
bring me tremendous happiness.
それっ
だめです
きゃああっ！
だめ、です…
Please hold still.
Can you forgive me?
Desist in your actions.
What a predicament.
Fjorm... I'm sorry.
ふふ…
I am Gunnthrá... The eldest princess of Nifl.
Oh, my! I wasn't expecting you to just...
You saved my dear sister. For that, you have my thanks.
You're a gentle soul, and your hands are so warm.
You must be exhausted. Why don't we take a rest?
I wish that all of my siblings could live happily together. If only...
I want to do whatever I can to help you. Just tell me what you need, and I'll be there.
Of course.
What can I do?
Goodness!
